snippet.title: Private Dick: Lipstick & Lies
snippet.description:
Private Dick is a visual novel inspired by noir detective films, Sin City and Max Payne. It delivers mystery, humour and erotica in a stylish, linear thriller.

BACK IT NOW ON KICKSTARTER
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ciscodonovan/private-dick-lipstick-and-lies/

Private Investigator Sam Steele is in a rut. His clients have dried up, his useless secretary is (still) waiting to be paid, and his ex-girlfriend has broken the sanctity of his favourite bar.

It's almost a relief when a case walks through the door. Almost. A missing dog, an unrequited debt and a suspicious kidnapping all come to, aha, a head in a dingy motel out of town.

Private Dick marries a captivating mystery with heady, whiskey-fuelled atmosphere and lashings of joyful depravity. A three-way marriage? Welcome to Private Dick.

MEET a diverse cast of compelling characters with their own agendas
UNCOVER the sordid secrets and myriad mysteries of social influencers
ENJOY lovingly illustrated, uniquely styled sex scenes

#nsfw #gametrailers #trailer #noir #visualnovel #indie #indiegames #lewd #adultgames
